data.textUthmani: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
data.wordByWord: وَمِنَ [And of] ٱلَّيْلِ [the night] فَٱسْجُدْ [prostrate] لَهُۥ [to Him] وَسَبِّحْهُ [and glorify Him] لَيْلًۭا [a night] طَوِيلًا [long]
data.transliteration: Wamina allayli fasjud lahu wasabbihhulaylan taweela

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ [these] يُحِبُّونَ [love] ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ [the immediate] وَيَذَرُونَ [and leave] وَرَآءَهُمْ [behind them] يَوْمًۭا [a Day] ثَقِيلًۭا [grave]
data.transliteration: Inna haola-i yuhibboonaalAAajilata wayatharoona waraahum yawmanthaqeela

data.textUthmani: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
data.wordByWord: نَّحْنُ [We] خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ [created them] وَشَدَدْنَآ [and We strengthened] أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ [their forms] وَإِذَا [and when] شِئْنَا [We will] بَدَّلْنَآ [We can change] أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ [their likeness[es]] تَبْدِيلًا [(with) a change]
data.transliteration: Nahnu khalaqnahum washadadnaasrahum wa-itha shi/na baddalna amthalahumtabdeela

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰذِهِۦ [this] تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ [(is) a reminder] فَمَن [so whoever] شَآءَ [wills] ٱتَّخَذَ [let him take] إِلَىٰ [to] رَبِّهِۦ [his Lord] سَبِيلًۭا [a way]
data.transliteration: Inna hathihi tathkiratun famanshaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeela

data.textUthmani: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] تَشَآءُونَ [you will] إِلَّآ [except] أَن [that] يَشَآءَ [wills] ٱللَّهُ ۚ [Allah] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] كَانَ [is] عَلِيمًا [All-Knower] حَكِيمًۭا [All-Wise]
data.transliteration: Wama tashaoona illa anyashaa Allahu inna Allaha kanaAAaleeman hakeema

data.textUthmani: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
data.wordByWord: يُدْخِلُ [He admits] مَن [whom] يَشَآءُ [He wills] فِى [into] رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ [His mercy] وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [but (for) the wrongdoers] أَعَدَّ [He has prepared] لَهُمْ [for them] عَذَابًا [a punishment] أَلِيمًۢا [painful]
data.transliteration: Yudkhilu man yashao fee rahmatihiwaththalimeena aAAadda lahum AAathabanaleema

data.wordByWord: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَـٰتِ [By the ones sent forth] عُرْفًۭا [one after another]
فَٱلْعَـٰصِفَـٰتِ [And the winds that blow] عَصْفًۭا [violently]
وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَٰتِ [And the ones that scatter] نَشْرًۭا [far and wide]
فَٱلْفَـٰرِقَـٰتِ [And those who separate] فَرْقًۭا [(by the) Criterion]
فَٱلْمُلْقِيَـٰتِ [And those who bring down] ذِكْرًا [(the) Reminder]
عُذْرًا [(As) justification] أَوْ [or] نُذْرًا [warning]
إِنَّمَا [Indeed, what] تُوعَدُونَ [you are promised] لَوَٰقِعٌۭ [will surely occur]
فَإِذَا [So when] ٱلنُّجُومُ [the stars] طُمِسَتْ [are obliterated]
وَإِذَا [And when] ٱلسَّمَآءُ [the heaven] فُرِجَتْ [is cleft asunder]
وَإِذَا [And when] ٱلْجِبَالُ [the mountains] نُسِفَتْ [are blown away]
وَإِذَا [And when] ٱلرُّسُلُ [the Messengers] أُقِّتَتْ [are gathered to their appointed time]

words.translation: are gathered to their appointed time

data.wordByWord: لِأَىِّ [For what] يَوْمٍ [Day] أُجِّلَتْ [are (these) postponed]
لِيَوْمِ [For (the) Day] ٱلْفَصْلِ [(of) Judgment]
وَمَآ [And what] أَدْرَىٰكَ [will make you know] مَا [what] يَوْمُ [(is the) Day] ٱلْفَصْلِ [(of) the Judgment]
وَيْلٌۭ [Woe] يَوْمَئِذٍۢ [that Day] لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ [to the deniers]
أَلَمْ [Did not] نُهْلِكِ [We destroy] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [the former (people)]
ثُمَّ [Then] نُتْبِعُهُمُ [We follow them up] ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ [(with) the later ones]
كَذَٰلِكَ [Thus] نَفْعَلُ [We deal] بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ [with the criminals]
وَيْلٌۭ [Woe] يَوْمَئِذٍۢ [that Day] لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ [to the deniers]
